trans-unit.source: Represents the chain policy to be applied when building an X509 certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: Representerer kjede policyen som skal brukes når du bygger en X509 sertifikatkjede.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object can have an X509ChainPolicy property that specifies the policy to be used in the verification process.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>objekt kan ha en X509ChainPolicy-egenskap som angir policyen som skal brukes i bekreftelsesprosessen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Note that only <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects can construct an X509ChainPolicy object.
trans-unit.target: Vær oppmerksom på at bare <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>objekter kan lage et X509ChainPolicy-objekt.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainPolicy"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainPolicy"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of object identifiers (OIDs) specifying which application policies or enhanced key usages (EKUs) the certificate supports.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av OIDer (object) ved å angi hvilken programmet policyer eller utvidet key bruksområder (EKUs) sertifikatet støtter.

trans-unit.source: By default, this collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Denne samlingen er tom som standard.

trans-unit.source: You can add additional object identifiers (OIDs) to the collection using the following code: [!code-cs[x509chaintest#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/adddaa46-87de-45bb-a760-_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#5](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/adddaa46-87de-45bb-a760-_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/adddaa46-87de-45bb-a760-_1.vb)]
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til flere OIDer (object) samling med følgende kode: [!code-cs [x509chaintest&5;](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/adddaa46-87de-45bb-a760-_1.cs)][!code-cpp[x509chaintest&5;](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/adddaa46-87de-45bb-a760-_1.cpp)][!code-vb[x509chaintest nummer&5; ](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/adddaa46-87de-45bb-a760-_1.vb)]

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of object identifiers (OIDs) specifying which certificate policies the certificate supports.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av OIDer (object) angir hvilke sertifikatet policyer sertifikatet støtter.

trans-unit.source: By default, this collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Denne samlingen er tom som standard.

trans-unit.source: This property is only supported on Windows XP and later operating systems.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes bare på Windows XP og senere operativsystemer.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.OidCollection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Represents an additional collection of certificates that can be searched by the chaining engine when validating a certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en ekstra samling av sertifikater som kan søkes av kjede motoren ved validering av en sertifikatkjede.

trans-unit.source: Protocols such as Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) and Secure MIME (S/MIME) allow the inclusion of additional certificates for use in validating a certificate chain; these certificates can prove to be useful in the validation process.
trans-unit.target: Protokoller som Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) og sikre MIME (S/MIME) tillater inkludering av flere sertifikater for bruk i validering av en sertifikatkjede; Disse sertifikatene bevise kan være nyttig i valideringen.

trans-unit.source: This property allows these certificates to be passed to the chain validation engine.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan disse sertifikatene som skal sendes til kjede validering-motoren.

trans-unit.source: By default, this collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Denne samlingen er tom som standard.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainPolicy"></xref> members to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller det <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ChainPolicy"> </xref> medlemmer til standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: Resets all class properties to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller alle klasseegenskaper til standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets values for X509 revocation flags.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdier for X509 opphevelse flagg.

trans-unit.source: This property uses values from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationFlag> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen bruker verdier fra det <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationFlag>opplisting.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationFlag>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationFlag> is the default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationFlag>er standardverdien.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationFlag>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationFlag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationFlag"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationFlag"></xref> value supplied is not a valid flag.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationFlag"> </xref> angitte verdien er ikke et gyldig flagg.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets values for X509 certificate revocation mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdier for X509 sertifikatet opphevelse modus.

trans-unit.source: This property uses values from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen bruker verdier fra det <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode>opplisting.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode> is the default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode>er standardverdien.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode"></xref> value supplied is not a valid flag.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode"> </xref> angitte verdien er ikke et gyldig flagg.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time span that elapsed during online revocation verification or downloading the certificate revocation list (CRL).
trans-unit.target: Henter tidsrommet forekommet under online opphevelse bekreftelse eller laste ned sertifikatopphevelseslisten (CRL).

trans-unit.source: When using online revocation checking, this property can be used to set the URL retrieval timeout.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker tilkoblet opphevelse kontroll, kan denne egenskapen brukes til å angi tidsavbrudd for henting av URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>objektet.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets verification flags for the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Henter bekreftelse flagg for sertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: This property returns values from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509VerificationFlags> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer verdiene fra det <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509VerificationFlags>opplisting.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509VerificationFlags>

trans-unit.source: A value from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509VerificationFlags"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: En verdi fra den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509VerificationFlags"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509VerificationFlags"></xref> value supplied is not a valid flag.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509VerificationFlags"> </xref> angitte verdien er ikke et gyldig flagg.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509VerificationFlags"></xref> is the default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509VerificationFlags"></xref>er standardverdien.

trans-unit.source: The time that the certificate was verified expressed in local time.
trans-unit.target: Klokkeslettet da sertifikatet ble kontrollert uttrykt i lokal tid.

trans-unit.source: This property returns a value indicating the time the certificate was validated, expressed in local time.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer en verdi som angir tiden sertifikatet ble godkjent, uttrykt i lokal tid.

trans-unit.source: This is important when validating signed messages, since the signature must have been valid at the time of signing, not at the time of validation.
trans-unit.target: Dette er viktig når du validerer signerte meldinger fordi signaturen må ha vært gyldig da logger, ikke da validering.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DateTime>objektet.</xref:System.DateTime>
